Package com.example.lotteryevent.adapters

Class AdminImagesAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.lotteryevent.adapters.AdminImagesAdapter.ImageHolder>
com.example.lotteryevent.adapters.AdminImagesAdapter
public class AdminImagesAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.lotteryevent.adapters.AdminImagesAdapter.ImageHolder>
RecyclerView Adapter for displaying a grid or list of images in the Admin Dashboard.

This adapter handles the binding of AdminImageItem objects to the view. It specifically handles the decoding of Base64 encoded image strings into Bitmap objects for display in an ImageView.

    • onBindViewHolder

      public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull com.example.lotteryevent.adapters.AdminImagesAdapter.ImageHolder holder, int position)
      Binds the data from the AdminImageItem at the given position to the ViewHolder.

      This method decodes the Base64 string from the item into a Bitmap. If decoding fails (e.g., invalid Base64 string), a default fallback report icon is displayed. It also sets up the click listener for the item.

      Specified by:
      onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<com.example.lotteryevent.adapters.AdminImagesAdapter.ImageHolder>
      Parameters:
      holder - The ViewHolder which should be updated to represent the contents of the item at the given position in the data set.
      position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set.
